spells.description: Use: Zoom in on the targeted location.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 455,883 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 210,527.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 455,883 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 210,527.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 103,924 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 853,607 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
